general_advisory: Prevailing fog condition and gradual increase in temperature may increase the infestation for sucking pests like White fly, Aphids, Jassids & Thirps in vegetables. Regular monitoring of crops and installation of yellow sticky traps @ 8/acre is recommended. Spraying of pesticides should be done after 3 pm to protect honey bees.

advisory: Transplanting of 25-30 days old seedlings at a spacing of 20x15 cm, planting 2-3 seedlings per hill for high yielding varieties.
Application of 35 kg DAP, 20 kg MOP, and 8 kg Urea per acre during last puddling as basal fertilizer.
Monitor the activity of white grub & install light trap to attract the beetles.
Need based spraying and drenching with pesticides to protect the crop from diseases.
Control Flea beetle & other defoliators growth early in the crop growth stage.
Rouging of MYMV & ULCV infected plants & spraying of recommended pesticides.
Control aphids with need-based spraying of neem oil formulation or Flonicamid.
Spraying of Emamectin benzoate to reduce the infestation of pests.
Suitable weather for application of fertilizer to rabi vegetables at 3 to 4 weeks stage.
Prevent wilting in brinjal and tomato with Neem or Karanjaa cake and Tebuconazole fungicide.
Install Yellow Sticky trap to trap the vector of Papaya Leaf Curl Virus.
Spraying of Neem oil formulation and Flonicamid to control whitefly.
Spray Marigold plant with recommended pesticides to control infestation of pests.
